snippet: Mary Williams Walsh answered reader questions about public employee pensions, private pensions, and pensions for employees of bankrupt companies on Booming.
abstract: Mary Williams Walsh answered reader questions about public employee pensions, private pensions, and pensions for employees of bankrupt companies on Booming.
lead_paragraph: Mary Williams Walsh, a business reporter for The New York Times who covers pensions, answered reader questions about public employee pensions, private pensions and pensions for employees of bankrupt companies. You can read her responses at Booming, a Times blog about living through middle age.
